text: 12.15: Mt 18.10; FG 26.24Ana maaŋ mbe nzuaim, mbe khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu ŋanŋani o?” Mbe maaŋ ana nzuaim, ana khaŋ tɨgap havhargiap khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Fhuvara. Ana guigi guarara mbu thɨmkamanin.” Mbe thav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Mbar, anan ŋina ndu mbui.”12.15 Mba tugen Zudaiŋ vhɨrve mbe khueŋ khothɨgi, Fhe Bakɨme enseran ŋaar khare, ana guman kera ki, ana vhɨra mba gumara fara muuŋgi.
